name: cortex
description: Persistent local memory for Claude Code. Longer sessions, cross-session recall, zero cloud.

scripts.build: npm run build:index && npm run build:mcp && cp node_modules/sql.js/dist/sql-wasm.wasm dist/
scripts.build:index: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --external:@xenova/transformers --external:onnxruntime-node --external:sharp --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; import { fileURLToPath } from 'url'; import { dirname } from 'path'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url); const __filename = fileURLToPath(import.meta.url); const __dirname = dirname(__filename);"
scripts.build:mcp: esbuild src/mcp-server.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=esm --outfile=dist/mcp-server.js --external:@xenova/transformers --external:onnxruntime-node --external:sharp --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; import { fileURLToPath } from 'url'; import { dirname } from 'path'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url); const __filename = fileURLToPath(import.meta.url); const __dirname = dirname(__filename);"
